counting_objects_up_to_10.name: Counting objects up to 10
counting_objects_up_to_10.description: Counting a collection of up to 10 items.

comparing_more_or_fewer.description: Identifying which of two groups has more or fewer objects.

intro_to_addition_and_subtraction.description: Understanding the basic concepts of adding and taking away with small numbers.

counting_review_up_to_20.name: Counting review up to 20
counting_review_up_to_20.description: Review of counting skills up to 20.

skip_counting.name: Skip-counting
skip_counting.description: Counting by twos, fives, and tens.

place_value_tens_ones.name: Place value - tens and ones
place_value_tens_ones.description: Understanding the concept of tens and ones in two-digit numbers.

comparing_numbers_up_to_100.name: Comparing numbers up to 100
comparing_numbers_up_to_100.description: Comparing two-digit numbers using greater than, less than, and equal to.

addition_subtraction_within_20.name: Addition and subtraction within 20
addition_subtraction_within_20.description: Adding and subtracting numbers with sums and minuends up to 20.

geometry_2d_3d_shapes.name: 2D and 3D shapes
geometry_2d_3d_shapes.description: Identifying and distinguishing between 2D and 3D shapes, and understanding their attributes.

telling_time_hour_half_hour.name: Telling time to the hour and half hour
telling_time_hour_half_hour.description: Reading analog and digital clocks to the hour and half hour.

money_coins.name: Counting money (coins)
money_coins.description: Identifying and counting the value of coins.

measurement_length.name: Measuring length
measurement_length.description: Measuring the length of objects using non-standard and standard units.

data_representation.name: Data representation
data_representation.description: Creating and interpreting simple bar graphs, pictographs, and tally charts.

place_value_hundreds.name: Place value up to hundreds
place_value_hundreds.description: Understanding the concept of hundreds, tens, and ones in three-digit numbers.

comparing_numbers_up_to_1000.name: Comparing numbers up to 1000
comparing_numbers_up_to_1000.description: Comparing three-digit numbers using greater than, less than, and equal to.

addition_within_100.name: Addition within 100
addition_within_100.description: Adding two-digit numbers, with and without regrouping.

subtraction_within_100.name: Subtraction within 100
subtraction_within_100.description: Subtracting two-digit numbers, with and without regrouping.

addition_subtraction_word_problems_withi.name: Addition and subtraction word problems within 100
addition_subtraction_word_problems_withi.description: Solving one- and two-step word problems involving addition and subtraction within 100.

intro_to_multiplication.name: Introduction to multiplication
intro_to_multiplication.description: Understanding multiplication as repeated addition, using arrays and equal groups.

telling_time_to_5_minutes.name: Telling time to the nearest 5 minutes
telling_time_to_5_minutes.description: Reading analog and digital clocks to the nearest 5 minutes.

money_bills_and_coins.name: Counting money (bills and coins)
money_bills_and_coins.description: Counting combinations of bills and coins.

measurement_standard_units.name: Measuring length with standard units
measurement_standard_units.description: Measuring length using inches, feet, centimeters, and meters.

geometry_fractions_of_shapes.name: Fractions of shapes
geometry_fractions_of_shapes.description: Partitioning shapes into equal parts and describing the parts as fractions.

rounding_numbers.name: Rounding numbers
rounding_numbers.description: Rounding whole numbers to the nearest 10 or 100.

addition_within_1000.name: Addition within 1000
addition_within_1000.description: Adding three-digit numbers, with and without regrouping.

subtraction_within_1000.name: Subtraction within 1000
subtraction_within_1000.description: Subtracting three-digit numbers, with and without regrouping.

properties_of_multiplication.description: Understanding the commutative, associative, and distributive properties of multiplication.

division_facts.name: Division facts
division_facts.description: Mastering division facts corresponding to multiplication facts up to 10x10.

multiplication_division_word_problems.name: Multiplication and division word problems
multiplication_division_word_problems.description: Solving word problems involving multiplication and division.

understanding_fractions.name: Understanding fractions
understanding_fractions.description: Representing fractions on a number line and understanding equivalent fractions.

comparing_fractions.name: Comparing fractions
comparing_fractions.description: Comparing fractions with the same numerator or the same denominator.

area_and_perimeter.name: Area and perimeter
area_and_perimeter.description: Understanding the concepts of area and perimeter and calculating them for rectangles.

telling_time_to_the_minute.name: Telling time to the minute
telling_time_to_the_minute.description: Reading analog and digital clocks to the nearest minute.

measurement_mass_volume.name: Measurement of mass and volume
measurement_mass_volume.description: Measuring and estimating liquid volumes and masses of objects using standard units.

place_value_and_rounding.name: Place Value and Rounding
place_value_and_rounding.description: Understanding place value to millions and rounding multi-digit whole numbers.

multi_digit_arithmetic.name: Multi-Digit Arithmetic
multi_digit_arithmetic.description: Adding and subtracting multi-digit whole numbers.

multiplication_of_multi_digit_numbers.name: Multiplication of Multi-Digit Numbers
multiplication_of_multi_digit_numbers.description: Multiplying a whole number of up to four digits by a one-digit whole number, and multiplying two two-digit numbers.

division_of_multi_digit_numbers.description: Finding whole-number quotients and remainders with up to four-digit dividends and one-digit divisors.

prime_composite_numbers_and_factorizatio.name: Prime, Composite Numbers, and Factorization
prime_composite_numbers_and_factorizatio.description: Identifying prime and composite numbers and finding prime factorization.

factors_and_multiples.name: Factors and Multiples
factors_and_multiples.description: Finding all factor pairs for a whole number in the range 1-100.

fraction_equivalence_and_ordering.name: Fraction Equivalence and Ordering
fraction_equivalence_and_ordering.description: Recognizing and generating equivalent fractions, and comparing fractions with different numerators and denominators.

operations_with_fractions.name: Operations with Fractions
operations_with_fractions.description: Adding and subtracting fractions with like denominators, and multiplying a fraction by a whole number.

decimal_notation.name: Decimal Notation
decimal_notation.description: Understanding decimal notation for fractions, and comparing decimal fractions.

measurement_conversions.name: Measurement Conversions
measurement_conversions.description: Converting measurements from a larger unit to a smaller unit.

geometry_angles_and_lines.name: Geometry - Angles and Lines
geometry_angles_and_lines.description: Measuring angles in whole-number degrees using a protractor. Recognizing and drawing lines of symmetry.

order_of_operations.name: Order of Operations
order_of_operations.description: Understanding and applying the order of operations (PEMDAS/BODMAS) to evaluate expressions.

decimal_place_value.name: Decimal Place Value
decimal_place_value.description: Understanding place value to the thousandths place.

operations_with_decimals.name: Operations with Decimals
operations_with_decimals.description: Adding, subtracting, multiplying, and dividing decimals to hundredths.

add_subtract_fractions_unlike_denominato.name: Add and subtract fractions with unlike denominators
add_subtract_fractions_unlike_denominato.description: Adding and subtracting fractions with unlike denominators, including mixed numbers.

divide_fractions.name: Divide fractions
divide_fractions.description: Dividing unit fractions by whole numbers and whole numbers by unit fractions.

volume_of_rectangular_prisms.name: Volume of rectangular prisms
volume_of_rectangular_prisms.description: Understanding the concept of volume and finding the volume of rectangular prisms.

coordinate_plane.name: Coordinate plane
coordinate_plane.description: Graphing points on the coordinate plane to solve real-world and mathematical problems.

classify_2d_figures.name: Classify 2D figures
classify_2d_figures.description: Classifying two-dimensional figures into categories based on their properties.

patterns_and_relationships.name: Patterns and relationships
patterns_and_relationships.description: Analyzing patterns and relationships between numbers.

integers_and_absolute_value.name: Integers and Absolute Value
integers_and_absolute_value.description: Understanding integers, the number line, opposites, and absolute value.

ratios_and_proportional_relationships.name: Ratios and Proportional Relationships
ratios_and_proportional_relationships.description: Understanding ratio concepts and using ratio reasoning to solve problems.

the_number_system.name: The Number System
the_number_system.description: Dividing fractions by fractions, fluently dividing multi-digit numbers, and understanding the system of rational numbers.

introduction_to_exponents.name: Introduction to Exponents
introduction_to_exponents.description: Understanding and evaluating numerical expressions involving whole-number exponents.

expressions_and_equations.name: Expressions and Equations
expressions_and_equations.description: Applying and extending previous understandings of arithmetic to algebraic expressions and solving one-variable equations and inequalities.

geometry_area_volume.name: Geometry - Area and Volume
geometry_area_volume.description: Solving real-world and mathematical problems involving area, surface area, and volume.

statistics_and_probability.name: Statistics and Probability
statistics_and_probability.description: Developing understanding of statistical variability and summarizing and describing distributions.

operations_with_rational_numbers.name: Operations with Rational Numbers
operations_with_rational_numbers.description: Applying and extending previous understandings of operations with fractions to add, subtract, multiply, and divide rational numbers.

expressions_and_equations_with_rational_.name: Expressions and Equations with Rational Numbers
expressions_and_equations_with_rational_.description: Using properties of operations to generate equivalent expressions and solve real-life and mathematical problems using numerical and algebraic expressions and equations.

ratios_and_proportional_relationships_an.name: Analysis of Ratios and Proportional Relationships
ratios_and_proportional_relationships_an.description: Analyzing proportional relationships and using them to solve real-world and mathematical problems.

area_of_circles_and_circumference.name: Area of Circles and Circumference
area_of_circles_and_circumference.description: Understanding the formulas for the area and circumference of a circle and using them to solve problems.

geometry_scale_drawings_and_construction.name: Geometry - Scale Drawings and Constructions
geometry_scale_drawings_and_construction.description: Drawing, constructing, and describing geometrical figures and describing the relationships between them.

statistics_and_probability_inferences.name: Statistics and Probability - Inferences
statistics_and_probability_inferences.description: Using random sampling to draw inferences about a population and drawing informal comparative inferences about two populations.

probability_of_events.name: Probability of Events
probability_of_events.description: Investigating chance processes and developing, using, and evaluating probability models.

the_number_system_irrational_numbers.name: The Number System - Irrational Numbers
the_number_system_irrational_numbers.description: Understanding that there are numbers that are not rational, and approximating them by rational numbers.

expressions_and_equations_exponents_and_.name: Expressions and Equations - Exponents and Radicals
expressions_and_equations_exponents_and_.description: Working with radicals and integer exponents.

proportional_relationships_lines_and_lin.name: Proportional Relationships, Lines, and Linear Equations
proportional_relationships_lines_and_lin.description: Understanding the connections between proportional relationships, lines, and linear equations.

geometry_congruence_and_similarity.name: Geometry - Congruence and Similarity
geometry_congruence_and_similarity.description: Understanding congruence and similarity using physical models, transparencies, or geometry software.

pythagorean_theorem.name: Pythagorean Theorem
pythagorean_theorem.description: Understanding and applying the Pythagorean Theorem.

volume_of_cones_cylinders_and_spheres.name: Volume of Cones, Cylinders, and Spheres
volume_of_cones_cylinders_and_spheres.description: Solving real-world and mathematical problems involving volume of cylinders, cones, and spheres.

statistics_and_probability_bivariate_dat.name: Statistics and Probability - Bivariate Data
statistics_and_probability_bivariate_dat.description: Investigating patterns of association in bivariate data.

expressions_and_equations_algebraic.name: Algebraic Expressions and Equations
expressions_and_equations_algebraic.description: Interpreting the structure of expressions and writing expressions in equivalent forms to solve problems.

arithmetic_with_polynomials_and_rational.name: Arithmetic with Polynomials and Rational Expressions

creating_equations.name: Creating Equations
creating_equations.description: Creating equations that describe numbers or relationships.

reasoning_with_equations_and_inequalitie.name: Reasoning with Equations and Inequalities
reasoning_with_equations_and_inequalitie.description: Understanding solving equations as a process of reasoning and explaining the reasoning. Solving equations and inequalities in one variable.

representing_functions.name: Representing Functions
representing_functions.description: Understanding the concept of a function and using function notation. Interpreting functions that arise in applications in terms of the context.

linear_and_exponential_models.name: Linear and Exponential Models
linear_and_exponential_models.description: Constructing and comparing linear and exponential models and solving problems.

statistics_interpreting_data.name: Statistics - Interpreting Data
statistics_interpreting_data.description: Summarizing, representing, and interpreting data on a single count or measurement variable and on two categorical and quantitative variables.

congruence_and_similarity.name: Congruence and Similarity
congruence_and_similarity.description: Experimenting with transformations in the plane and understanding congruence and similarity in terms of rigid motions and transformations.

right_triangles_and_trigonometry.name: Right Triangles and Trigonometry
right_triangles_and_trigonometry.description: Defining trigonometric ratios and solving problems involving right triangles.

circles.name: Circles
circles.description: Understanding and applying theorems about circles.

expressing_geometric_properties_with_equ.name: Expressing Geometric Properties with Equations
expressing_geometric_properties_with_equ.description: Using coordinates to prove simple geometric theorems algebraically.

geometric_measurement_and_dimension.name: Geometric Measurement and Dimension
geometric_measurement_and_dimension.description: Explaining and applying volume formulas for various 3D shapes to solve problems.

modeling_with_geometry.name: Modeling with Geometry
modeling_with_geometry.description: Applying geometric concepts in modeling situations.

conditional_probability_and_the_rules_of.name: Conditional Probability and the Rules of Probability
conditional_probability_and_the_rules_of.description: Understanding independence and conditional probability and using them to interpret data.

algebra_seeing_structure_in_expressions.name: Algebra - Seeing Structure in Expressions
algebra_seeing_structure_in_expressions.description: Interpreting the structure of expressions and writing expressions in equivalent forms to solve problems.

arithmetic_with_polynomials_and_rational.name: Arithmetic with Polynomials and Rational Expressions (Advanced)
arithmetic_with_polynomials_and_rational.description: Understanding the relationship between zeros and factors of polynomials.

creating_equations_advanced.name: Creating Equations (Advanced)
creating_equations_advanced.description: Creating equations that describe numbers or relationships, including more complex scenarios.

reasoning_with_equations_and_inequalitie.name: Reasoning with Equations and Inequalities (Advanced)
reasoning_with_equations_and_inequalitie.description: Solving equations and inequalities in one variable, and solving systems of equations.

interpreting_functions.name: Interpreting Functions
interpreting_functions.description: Interpreting functions that arise in applications in terms of the context and analyzing functions using different representations.

building_functions.name: Building Functions
building_functions.description: Building a function that models a relationship between two quantities.

linear_quadratic_and_exponential_models.name: Linear, Quadratic, and Exponential Models
linear_quadratic_and_exponential_models.description: Constructing and comparing linear, quadratic, and exponential models and solving problems.

trigonometric_functions.name: Trigonometric Functions
trigonometric_functions.description: Extending the domain of trigonometric functions using the unit circle and modeling periodic phenomena with trigonometric functions.

statistics_and_probability_interpreting_.name: Statistics and Probability - Interpreting Categorical and Quantitative Data
statistics_and_probability_interpreting_.description: Summarizing, representing, and interpreting data on a single count or measurement variable and on two categorical and quantitative variables.

functions_advanced.name: Functions (Advanced)
functions_advanced.description: Analyzing functions using different representations, building new functions from existing functions, and understanding inverse functions.

trigonometry_advanced.name: Trigonometry (Advanced)
trigonometry_advanced.description: Applying trigonometry to general triangles (Law of Sines, Law of Cosines) and understanding and applying trigonometric identities.

vectors_and_matrices.name: Vectors and Matrices
vectors_and_matrices.description: Representing and manipulating vectors, and performing operations on matrices.

conic_sections.name: Conic Sections
conic_sections.description: Translating between the geometric description and the equation for a conic section.

complex_numbers.name: Complex Numbers
complex_numbers.description: Performing arithmetic operations with complex numbers and representing complex numbers and their operations on the complex plane.

probability_and_statistics_advanced.name: Probability and Statistics (Advanced)
probability_and_statistics_advanced.description: Using probability to evaluate outcomes of decisions and understanding and evaluating random processes underlying statistical experiments.

limits_and_continuity.name: Limits and Continuity
limits_and_continuity.description: Understanding the concept of a limit and evaluating limits graphically and algebraically. Understanding continuity in terms of limits.

differentiation_definition_and_basic_rul.name: Differentiation: Definition and Basic Derivative Rules
differentiation_definition_and_basic_rul.description: Defining the derivative of a function and using basic rules to find derivatives of functions.

differentiation_composite_implicit_and_i.name: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions
differentiation_composite_implicit_and_i.description: Applying the chain rule to find the derivative of composite functions, and using implicit differentiation.

contextual_applications_of_differentiati.name: Contextual Applications of Differentiation
contextual_applications_of_differentiati.description: Interpreting the meaning of the derivative in context, including related rates, optimization, and motion problems.

analytical_applications_of_differentiati.name: Analytical Applications of Differentiation
analytical_applications_of_differentiati.description: Using derivatives to analyze functions, including finding critical points, intervals of increase and decrease, and concavity.

integration_and_accumulation_of_change.name: Integration and Accumulation of Change
integration_and_accumulation_of_change.description: Understanding the definite integral as a limit of Riemann sums and as a net accumulation of change.

applications_of_integration.name: Applications of Integration
applications_of_integration.description: Finding the area of a region, volume of a solid, and the average value of a function.
